title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.2 - Free time allowances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.2 - Free time allowances

State Regulations
(a) Inbound cargo. (1)

Five days (exclusive of

Saturdays, Sundays and holidays). When a legal holiday falls on Sunday, the
following Monday will be excluded. (2)

When space is available, six days free
time will be allowed on cargo discharged from vessels engaged in the South and

Central American trades and the West Indies and the Caribbean trades. (b) Outbound cargo. Seven days
(exclusive of Saturdays, Sundays and holidays). When a legal holiday falls on

Sunday, the following Monday will be excluded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1244.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
